opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, ZAGREB, TREŠNJEVKA, 178 m2 Prodaje se moderno uređena 7-sobna kuća ukupne površine 178 m2 izgrađena 2021. godine, koja se sastoji od dva odvojena stana – S1 i S2 koji se mogu koristiti odvojeno ili kao cjelina. Ova nekretnina nudi vrhunski komfor i suvremenu tehnologiju, uključujući Smart Home sustav i podno grijanje kroz cijelu kuću. Kući pripada i prekrasan vrt s kaminom, savršen za opuštanje i druženja na otvorenom. Stan S1 nalazi se u prizemlju kuće i sastoji se od dnevnog boravka sa blagovaonicom, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonice i hodnika. Stanu pripada i jedno parkirno mjesto u dvorištu kuće te vrtna terasa. Stan S2 prostire se kroz prizemlje, prvi kat te uvučeni kat a sastoji se od prostranog dnevnog boravka sa blagovaonicom, tri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, toaleta i dva hodnika. Stanu pripadaju i balkon na prvom te terasa i balkon na uvučenom katu, vrt i vanjsko parkirno mjesto. Kuća se nalazi na odličnoj lokaciji na Trešnjevci u blizini okretišta Ljubljanica i svih bitnih sadržaja kao što su škola, vrtić, banka, javni prijevoz i sl. Ova kvalitetno izgrađena i moderno uređena kuća nudi idealnu kombinaciju luksuza, funkcionalnosti i udobnosti, savršenu za obitelji ili investiciju. Vlasništvo uredno 1/1. Kuća posjeduje Uporabnu dozvolu, mogućnost kupnje putem kredita. HOUSE FOR SALE, ZAGREB, TREŠNJEVKA, 178 m² For sale is a modernly designed house with a total area of 178 m², built in 2021, consisting of two separate apartments – S1 and S2, which can be used independently or as a single unit. This property offers exceptional comfort and cutting-edge technology, including a Smart Home system and underfloor heating throughout the house. The house also features a beautiful garden with a fireplace, perfect for relaxation and outdoor gatherings. S1 is located on the ground floor and consists of a living room with a dining area, two bedrooms, a bathroom, and a hallway. The apartment also includes one private parking space in the yard and a garden terrace. S2 spans three levels – the ground floor, first floor, and recessed floor, and consists of a spacious living room with a dining area, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a guest toilet, and two hallways. The apartment also includes a balcony on the first floor, a terrace and balcony on the recessed floor, a garden, and an outdoor parking space. The house is located in an excellent area in Trešnjevka, close to all essential amenities such as schools, kindergartens, banks, public transportation, etc. This high-quality and modern home offers the perfect combination of luxury, functionality, and comfort, making it ideal for families or investment purposes. Ownership is clear 1/1. The house has a usage permit and can be purchased with a mortgage loan.
